title: A Feast of Shadows
description: On the eve of Earth's final days, chaos has taken to the streets. An oppressed, polluted Earth is struggling to recover from a global war that has divided two races: Humans & Dracins.Tyler Deamond, the President of the western corporation, has been shot in cold blood. His killer, Raven Blackheart, is the most wanted woman in the world. She is also the last hope for the survival of mankind.
author: Rae Lori
